'''1.12-pre4'''<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-112-pre-release-3|Minecraft 1.12 Pre-Release 4}}</ref> is the fourth pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.12]].

== Additions ==
=== Command format ===
* {{cmd|function}}
** Added new arguments:
*** <code>if <selector></code> - runs the function only if the specified selector is found (currently only matches 1).
*** <code>unless <selector></code> - runs the function except when the specified selector is found (currently only matches 0 or 2+).

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Map]]s'''
* [[Bed]]s now have the correct color on the map.
